episode.title: The Communist Manifesto Part 2
episode.description:
In the second episode, we continue reading. I believe this is the meat of the Manifesto, so listen carefully (and peacefully). There's a decent definition of what Communism entails, and we even touch on feminism very very briefly.

Drink of the Evening: Adult Grape Juice

Chapters covered: 2. Proletarians and Communists
